name: Repossessed
description:
This game is a work in progress project made in Game Maker, inspired by the theme 'Haunted House'.

Controls:

Arrow Keys = Move

Space = Transform from monster/house states

P = Pause game

Escape = Quit game

Control a sentient haunted house who sits in wait for innocent victims to feast upon for sustenance. You can only move and consume when in your monstrous form, but the moment you are seen moving your victims will start running away.

Let too many victims escape and the police will come to throw you in the Big House. Wait around for too long and you will slowly starve to death (hunger decreases faster in your monster state).
